summary: WINDOWS ROLL DOWN BY THEMSELVES VEHICLE IN PARK. ONE TIME VEHICLE PLACES SELF IN PARK WHEN BRAKING PULLING INTO A PARKING LOT.  ONE OCCURRENCE, VEHICLE PLACED SELF IN PARK AND DIED IN STOP AND GO TRAFFIC ON INTERSTATE.  HEATED SEATS WIRED BACKWARD.....UPDATED 11/03/17 *BF  UPDATED 11/09/2017*JS
